pr_title: IGNITE-13599 Switch tests should have better precision

timeline.bodyText: Calendar? ORLY? Have you considered LocalDateTime?
timeline.author: ivandasch
ivandasch

timeline.bodyText: I don't hesitate to insist, that System.nanoTime() is the only option.
timeline.author: ivandasch

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure that creating the same map on each iteration is a good idea?
timeline.author: ivandasch

replies.bodyText: each key has it's own map

replies.bodyText: Sorry, collections difers from each other on each iteration
